summary: This mod adds 5 small shelters to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][size=5]Shelter, Cabins & Hideouts[/size][/font][/center]
[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/tesvexedx920odn5vwea7h.png[/img]

[center][font=Verdana][size=5]About[/size][/font][/center]

Please excuse my english, it`s not my native language, so don`t get mad, if I make some mistakes ;)

This mod adds 5 small shelters to Skyrim. They all come with a bed, food, ingredients and other usefull stuff to survive in the wilds of Skyrim. Don`t expect to find treasures. I made this mod for personal use, but I know there are a lot of people playing with mods like Frostfall, Realistic Needs & Desease etc., so perhaps you will find this little shelters useful. All of them are created without loadingscreens. They are not replacing anything, I only added a few things to the vanilla game. You won`t need any DLC.

[i][u]Locations:[/u][/i]
x.Clearpine Point
x.Deep Folk Crossing
x.Gjukars Monument
x.Greenspring Hollow
x.Evergreen Grove

Please notice, that this is still a WIP, I`m planing to add more content. Based on the interest, I will publish this here when it`s done. :)

[center][font=Verdana][size=5]Installation[/size][/font][/center]
As usual use NMM, or download the file manually and add it to your Skyrim Data. Be sure to mark the plugin as active. It`s only a very small file, since there are no new texture, sounds or anything. For that reason un/ installing should be save at any time.
[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/tesvexedx920l5e8dc3rwu.png[/img]

[center][font=Verdana][size=5]Compatibility[/size][/font][/center]
This mod should be compatible with almost every mod on the nexus - exept those who change the mentioned areas. If you find any bugs, please let me know.

[center][font=Verdana][size=3]Feedback and Screenshots are appreciated, please feel free to leave your ideas & thoughts. [/size][/font][/center]
author: Neladrie
